Section.name: About Sir C R Reddy College of Engineering
Section.description:
Sir C. R. Reddy College of Engineering was established in 1989. It is sanctioned and recognized by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and affiliated to JNTUK and approved by AICTE, New Delhi. The institute works to provide high quality technical education through a creative balance of academic and industry oriented learning. The institute gives top priority to ethical values and high standards and a commitment to value based education. It is located at Vatluru, Eluru with an area of 30.48 acres.
CRAA offers UG & PG Course in various disciplines. Some of them are tabulated below:
Click here C.R. Reddy College of Engineering Courses
Sir C R Reddy College of Engineering AP EAPCET Cutoff 2024 is out. The table given below shows the cutoff for Round 1.
The Training and Placement is organized with the prime motive to equip students with employable skills through training and help them attain their desired employment goal. The institute arrange project work in industries, industrial visits, organizes campus interviews and provide inputs to face interviews/selections. Some of the potential recruiters of CRAA are TATA, Infosys, Wipro, Idea, LIC PLUS, Sonata Software, Computer Science Corporation, Satyam Computer Services and many more.
Know more C.R. Reddy College of Engineering Placement
Check here C. R. Reddy College Admissions
The institute provides transportation facility to students, staff and faculty. This facility has been extended to the student community to go on local tours, Off-Campus recruitment drives, Industrial Tours. Management has provided 3 buses for transportation facility.
